title: Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning            Planning       State of the Parks Report In 2004 a State of the Parks Report was prepared for Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site by the National Parks Conservation Association. The State of the Parks Program was launched by the NPCA in 1999. The goals of the program are to find the best way to assess the health of natural and cultural resources and to produce reports to communicate the findings to the public and congress.
